about_the_game:
In this FIRST PERSON IDLE GAME, you find yourself on a remote asteroid, tasked with producing as much power as possible for your company. Your job is to keep the machines running, and transfer the energy you produce back to your company. In return the company will reward you with upgrades, research and new machines that will make you able to produce MORE energy FASTER!

You will walk around on this asteroid and ensure that all the machines are running at all time. While also deciding what machines to invest energy into, in order to make them produce more! The company will also reward you with additional machines as time goes by and your asteroid will slowly but surely turn into a factory that you will have to keep running and ensure that it STAYS EFFICIENT.
